item.title: Evaluating Ruby in Ruby
item.description: TL;DR This article is about instruction sequences and evaluating them using pure Ruby. The repository is available here . Is it a Ruby implementation? No. It’s just a runner of instructions. It is similar to MRI’s virtual machine, but it lacks many features and it’s 100 times slower. Can I use it in my applications? Of course, no. Well, if you want. Does it work at all? Yes, and it even passes most language specs from RubySpec test suite.
